title: TaskVerse
description: A role based task management app that allows users to create, assign, and track tasks within a team.

title: ShellShowCases
description: A web-based interactive terminal portfolio for Ankit Saini. Allows users to explore information terminal-like interface.

title: ProBlogfolio
description: A full-stack blog platform with JWT authentication, allowing users to securely create, edit, delete, and view personal blog posts.
